state_description: Initial screen of CleanMyMac X where users can start a Smart Scan to clean, optimize, and protect their Mac.

enables.name: Smart Scan
enables.description: Initiates a comprehensive scan to clean system junk, detect malware, and optimize performance.

enables.name: Access System Junk
enables.description: Navigate to the System Junk cleaning module.

enables.name: Access Mail Attachments
enables.description: Navigate to the Mail Attachments cleaning module.

enables.name: Access Trash Bins
enables.description: Navigate to the Trash Bins cleaning module.

enables.name: Access Malware Removal
enables.description: Navigate to the Malware Removal module.

enables.name: Access Privacy
enables.description: Navigate to the Privacy protection module.

enables.name: Access Uninstaller
enables.description: Navigate to the Uninstaller module to remove applications.

enables.name: Access Updater
enables.description: Navigate to the Updater module to update applications.

enables.name: Access Extensions
enables.description: Navigate to the Extensions module to manage extensions.

enables.name: Access Space Lens
enables.description: Navigate to the Space Lens module to visualize disk space usage.

enables.name: Access Large & Old Files
enables.description: Navigate to the Large & Old Files module to manage large files.

enables.name: Access Shredder
enables.description: Navigate to the Shredder module to securely delete files.
